title: Thomson 9R PRO 139 cm (55 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV  (55PATH5050BL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV, 1N REMOTE, 1N MANUAL, 2N BATTERY, 1N WALLMOUNTING
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 6 Sound Mode (Standard, Music, News, Movie, Game, User), Sound Output Device (TV Speaker, ARC, S/PDIF)
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Android, Google Play Store with 6000+ Apps and Games, Chromecast Built-in, Google Assistant, Live TV Channels, 20+ Content Partners
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Network PM44-11BP 100M Ethernet Support (10/100M, DHCP), Browser, Support HDMI-ARC
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant Enabled Remote, Hot Keys of Sony Liv, Prime Video and YouTube
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: More Than 6000 Plus Apps and Games, Airplay, Chromecast, Google Play Store with 500,000 Plus TV Shows and Games, Google Assistant, Unlimited Content
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Powered by Android: Harness the power of artificial intelligence and experience a customized interface for you. The TV is powered by android for you to enjoy a variety of content. Powered by features such as memory optimization, fast boost, will enhance the speed and accuracy of processing.
product_description.Bezel-less Design: The elegant bezel-less design of this TV seamlessly blends into your decor, improving not only your viewing experience with the elegant design makes your home look premium.

review:
It is really a value for money. This is a 4K latest Anroid Smart TV just launched, TV is working fine with very high picture quality and the USP of this smart anroid TV is that it contains 40 W speakers which are really fantastic.

It contains lots of ports including HDMI, USB and LAN ports. You can cromcast your mobile screen directly to your TV screen. It contains Google voice assist function on its remote fromwhere you can just speak and all is reflected on your screen.

It's really a value for money with a true techno-innovation.

The picture quality is crisp n delight to eyes.the sound is pretty loud so I prefer lesser volunteer me to avoid disturbing neighbours. The apps running smoothly . The casting is smooth too with Hout any hassle or lag.
At present happy with purchase n time will tell the durability of the product.
Now enjoying the TV.

Though it is very early to write a review as is just 4th day of the product I'm using , on time delivery by Flipkart also get installation done on next day of the delivery, picture, sound quality is awesome, user-friendly UI, Google assistant is the best feature of the product, you can easily connect with your Google account, and start using your apps easily. Best product value for money.👍👌

Best picture quality and good sound, tv function very easy
worth of every penny and also flipkart is make my home beautiful with this tv.
its good choice of 4k tv ever.

I was skeptical before ordering Thompson TV, but they have delivered as promised.
Product usage started around 19/01/2022, and till date my feedback is -
1 Picture quality is good, crystal clear and their is no light leakage or other issue due to motion sensor.
2 Audio is good, you can clearly hear beat drop, even slight music instrument playing in back ground

I will recommend if you are planning to buy a good smart tv in budget price, you can plan for it.

Though it is very early to write a review as is just 3th day of the product l'm using, on time delivery by Flipkart also get installation done on next day of the delivery, picture, sound quality is awesome, user-friendly UI, Google assistant is the best feature of the product, you can easily connect with your Google account, and start using your apps easily. Best product value for money.

Fantastic Purchase...

This TV has a very good with high contrast ips panel which has excellent viewing angles and colours, the best part is the 40 watts speakers which is excellent and much appreciated in this price bracket.

Overall considering the price, screen quality and speaker setup this is a must buy and you hardly have any competition in this price bracket and that too in 4K ultra HD TV.

Good product.
Screen size good.
Colors good.
Picture quality good.
Android version is 9.0 - no option to upgrade to 10.0
Cannot find or install Jio TV.
Sound quality fine compared to 40 watt speakers (as claimed in the description).
Does not support Dolby
Bluetooth range on 2 meters (tried connecting my Jabra headphones).
Android gaming controllers do not connect.

Just Supperb and premium....
I was looking for hd Tv from one year. My many firend was suggesting me for MI tv as they are cheap and good in quality but when ever i start comparing all the tv thenthomson and vu has advance point. So i focused on Thomson and Vu. Some technical problem was raised in Vu tv's so i refuses the Vu. Then only focused on Thomson. Orderd at 21700 only with 5 offer's. Delivery on time and installed on the same day. Then i started satellite channels with hd and sd. Hd have crisp clear display and sd also has Supperb clearity.
If you are planning for a full hd tv(4k ultra hd) , don't go without 4k, then surly you can go to Thomson without any query. I have a long comparison with all the tv's.

Strong sound (Removed my Creative woofer)
Supper crisp clear view(ips pannel) Like i phone
Connectivity is fast as you can't even see when it is connected. Once you have to connect with your network setting. In full hd video, movie, drama and serial very low net is consumed.
There is no any lag during screen mirroring. I am playing BGMI.☺☺
Now i think that 43" is small in size because no difference occured in clearity as same as 22" old one has. So you should select 55" and above.

One of the best VFM TV one can buy….
Sound Output is really good….
Picture clarity is also really fine….
Connectivity is pretty good

One of the best smart TV in this price range. Totally satisfied and happy to have this product at home.

Shall recommend everyone to go for it without any second thought.

For the price I don't think there is anything out there that can compare.
You get fantastic picture and color output quality with great viewing angles.
Setting the TV is also pretty easy as technically it's almost stock android and physically very light in weight.
Doesn't have NETFLIX out of the box though!
And the only thing that could have been better is the sound quality don't get me wrong, It is loud enough due to 40W drivers but lacks the finesse.
Oh come-on, go buy a nice soundbar with the money you saved on this purchase. Because it has Bluetooth connectivity too.
Believe it or not I am using this one as a monitor and absolutely no strain on my eyes so far.

What more do you need. BTW, I have owned a 55 inch Thompson with fantastic after sales support.
Go for it!

I have bought this tv during flipkart sale and got a wonderful tv in my budget.
Pros- 1. Brilliant color & display
2. Wide angle viewing
3. Sound just loud and clear.
4. Slim than my existing led tv.
5. Handy remote.

Cons- still searching....

Build quality is not at all good , top side of the frame is not properly fixed.
Picture quality is okay.
Sound is just okay.
Overall an Okay okay product.


Don't expect miracle from this one.

Before buying this if you can handle the customer service which does not respond and have some patience with the wifi issue you can then buy this. if we talk about video and sound it is bery good you will enjoy hd and ulta hd content

But I would suggest everyone to go for UV 4k Tv for this price range maybe 1000 or 2000rs higher. Uv has Dolby vision and Dolby sound.

For the price I don't think there is anything out there that can compare.
You get fantastic picture and color output quality with great viewing angles.
Setting the TV is also pretty easy as technically it's almost stock android and physically very light in weight.
Doesn't have NETFLIX out of the box though!
And the only thing that could have been better is the sound quality don't get me wrong, It is loud enough due to 40W drivers but lacks the finesse.
Oh come-on, go buy a nice soundbar with the money you saved on this purchase. Because it has Bluetooth connectivity too.
Believe it or not I am using this one as a monitor and absolutely no strain on my eyes so far.

What more do you need. BTW, I have owned a 55 inch Thompson with fantastic after sales support.
Go for it!

Overall it's an okay product. There's no woofer effect or no bass at all wrt sound. So better to buy good sound bar. Picture is so good that you can enjoy 4K quality. I had wifi connectivity issue where every time I switch on the Tv i had to change date for the wifi to connect. Finally you can enjoy picture quality but no DTS sound. Buy this at cheaper price in any deals and buy good sound bar to enjoy full range. I raised complaint and even after 3 months Thomson company not responded. So I raised a complaint in consumer forum.
If you face any issue and the company is not responding to provide support raise a complaint in consumer forum : consumerhelpline.gov.in.

Too many black patches have been started coming out after 1 month of use. I raised many complain, but they say black patch are not covered under warranty. They are asking about Rs 5000 to fix this issue. Below is the mail from Thomson support. After the sale, Thomson doesn't provide service.

Better to go with LG or Samsung, they provide throughout support.

Warm greetings from Thomson!

As per the images shared by you there is a dust issue in the panel, hence this issue will be rectified on the chargeable basis, as it needs to open the panel, and there is a risk in opening the panel as it may cause damage. So find the charges below for 55 Inches TV, and if you agree for the same then please revert us with your confirmation, so that we can proceed further.

Rs. 450/- visiting charges
Rs.4200/- Panel cleaning and transportation charges.

Please confirm if you agree for the same so that we can proceed further.

Please feel free to reach out to us for any further assistance.

Regards
Thomson HD LED TV
Consumer Care
Toll Free: 1800-843-8777
